  <h3>Balogun Stephen Taiye</h3> 
  <p>A Medical Doctor and, QI Expert and Public Health professional with a passion to improve the healthcare indices of Nigeria. Had his data science training from the trio of [Brian Caffo](http://bcaffo.com), [Roger Peng](https://github.com/rdpeng) and [Jeff Leek](http://jtleek.com) of the John Hopkins Bloomberg school of Public Health, and his front-end programming with [Colleen Van Lent](https://si.umich.edu/people/colleen-van-lent) of University of Michigan and the W3CX series.</p>
  <p>He is a Fellow and a Member, Ambassador and Expert of <a href="http://isqua.org/education/meet-the-fellows"><abbr title="International Society for Quality in Healthcare">ISQua</abbr></a>, a member of the [Society for Quality in Health Care in Nigeria](http://www.sqhn.org) (SQHN), and has the [HIFA 2016 Country Representative of the year](http://hifa.org/news/announcement-hifa-country-representative-year-2016) award.</p>

  <h3>Balogun Kehinde Ayantunde</h3> 
  <p>A Clinician, Public Health Expert and a Continuous Quality Improvement Specialist with  10 years experience in both the public and private sectors. He has championed several QI projects in maternal and child health, and in HIV/AIDS prevention and managements.</p> 
  
  <p>He is a certified Six Sigma Green Belt expert, a Fellow and Member of the [International Society for Quality Healthcare](http://www.isqua.org/education/meet-the-fellows) (ISQua), and also has numerous certificates in healthcare quality and patient safety from [Institute for Healthcare Improvement](http://www.ihi.org) (IHI), WorldBank, [RCSI Institute of Leadership](http://www.rcsileadership.org/) amongst others. He holds Masters Degree in Public Health and Business Administration.</p>
